headline: Ask HN: How did you learn organizing and attention skills?
description:
Hello HN. Fellow geek here who suffers from pretty bad anxiety most days and most likely ADHD (which is undiagnosed.) One thing which kills me in life over and over again is lack of organization skills. It's not something my parents were ever good at (we were always the messy house) and is an area I am terribly lacking in. I managed to get by at work mostly due to the fact that I can deliver big results on certain things, but yes people notice I miss replies to some emails or I'll forget to handle something until much later or I just drop it all. People seemed to have overlooked those things due to the overall greater benefit. It's something I terribly need to fix. It's making me get depressed.

My question is, I am sure that others have faced these challenges as well. Can anyone please share how they overcame this?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 你是如何学习组织和注意技能的？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 你是如何學習組織和注意技能的？
description_zh-Hans:
你好，HN。我是一名宅男，大部分时间都患有严重的焦虑症，而且很可能患有多动症（未被诊断），这让我在生活中一次又一次地陷入困境，就是缺乏组织能力。这不是我父母擅长的事情（我们的房子总是很乱），也是我非常缺乏的一个领域。我在工作中设法过关，主要是由于我可以在某些事情上交出大的成果，但是，是的，人们注意到我错过了对一些电子邮件的回复，或者我会忘记处理一些事情，直到很晚，或者我就把它全部丢掉。人们似乎因为整体上更大的利益而忽略了这些事情。这是我非常需要解决的问题。这让我变得很沮丧。

我的问题是，我相信其他人也面临这些挑战。谁能分享一下他们是如何克服的？
